title: The Mad Scientist’s Daughter
description: The Mad Scientist’s Daughter is the heartbreaking story of the journey from childhood to adulthood, with an intriguing science fictional twist.There’s never been anyone - or anything - quite like Finn.He looks, and acts human, though he has no desire to be. He was programmed to assist his owners, and performs his duties to perfection. A billion-dollar construct, his primary task is to tutor Cat.When the government grants rights to the ever-increasing robot population, however, Finn struggles to find his place in the world.
author: Cassandra Rose Clarke
